name: Granudium
description:
Welcome to Granudium!

--------------------------------------

Objective: To win this game you must conquer all the circles on the screen.

Movement: Drag the player (white circle) to another circles in order to conquer it.

Note: Life alters when you move from one circle to another depending on:

    1. The relative size of the current circle you are in compared to the circle you moved to.

    2. The distance between the current circle you are in compared to the circle you moved to.
